abstract: The Federal Trade Commission on Friday approved Dow Chemical’s $15.3 billion takeover of the rival chemical company Rohm and Haas — removing the last condition to closing the much-watched deal.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission on Friday approved Dow Chemical’s $15.3 billion takeover of the rival chemical company Rohm and Haas — removing the last condition to closing the much-watched deal.

headline.main: F.T.C. Clears Dow’s Deal for Rohm and Haas
